translation.en: Guitarist and singer of Kiloton, Battle of the Bands winners 1996.

translation.en: They were gods. No one in this school liked heavy music same as now,
translation.vi: Họ là những vị thần. Chả ai ở trường này từng thích Heavy Metal,

translation.en: but Kiloton terrorized their way straight to victory. By 1997,
translation.vi: mà cách Killoton đi một mạch tới thắng lợi khiến ai nấy đều nể sợ. Đến năm 1997,

translation.en: they were considered the greatest unsigned metal band in the country.
translation.vi: họ là nhóm Metal tự do vĩ đại nhất cả nước.

translation.en: They could have been right up there with Metallica or Pantera, but they broke up.

translation.en: But you and me, that's not gonna happen to us.
